name: parallel-netcdf
description:
PnetCDF (Parallel netCDF) is a high-performance parallel I/O library for
accessing files in format compatibility with Unidata's NetCDF,
specifically the formats of CDF-1, 2, and 5.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: accfft
dependent_to.description:
AccFFT extends existing FFT libraries for CUDA-enabled Graphics
Processing Units (GPUs) to distributed memory clusters

dependent_to.name: esmf
dependent_to.description:
The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is high-performance, flexible
software infrastructure for building and coupling weather, climate, and
related Earth science applications. The ESMF defines an architecture for
composing complex, coupled modeling systems and includes data structures
and utilities for developing individual models.

dependent_to.name: moab
dependent_to.description:
MOAB is a component for representing and evaluating mesh data. MOAB can
store structured and unstructured mesh, consisting of elements in the
finite element 'zoo.' The functional interface to MOAB is simple yet
powerful, allowing the representation of many types of metadata commonly
found on the mesh. MOAB is optimized for efficiency in space and time,
based on access to mesh in chunks rather than through individual
entities, while also versatile enough to support individual entity
access.

dependent_to.name: wrf
dependent_to.description:
The Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) Model is a next-generation
mesoscale numerical weather prediction system designed for both
atmospheric research and operational forecasting applications.

dependent_to.name: petsc
dependent_to.description:
PETSc is a suite of data structures and routines for the scalable
(parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial
differential equations.

dependent_to.name: netcdf-c
dependent_to.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependent_to.name: ior
dependent_to.description:
The IOR software is used for benchmarking parallel file systems using
POSIX, MPI-IO, or HDF5 interfaces.

dependent_to.name: parallelio
dependent_to.description:
The Parallel IO libraries (PIO) are high-level parallel I/O C and
Fortran libraries for applications that need to do netCDF I/O from large
numbers of processors on a HPC system.
